author: _shemnon
content:
I wrote a java fuzzer for EOF layout - https://github.com/shemnon/besu/tree/eof/layout-fuzz
Overnight I had zero divergence between evmone and besu over 2 billion attempts.  I'll report new findings here - https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/issues/146
